TextLibrary.Text: Ooo, lookie here, lad. This be more than a cog, eh?
Ooo, lookie here, lad. This be more than a cog, eh?
Ooo, lookie here, lass. This be more than a cog, eh?
Ooo, lookie here, lass. This be more than a cog, eh?
Now THIS is what I call a piece of machinery. It actually seems to have some moving parts.

Now THIS is what I call a piece of machinery. It actually seems to have some moving parts.
Aye... aye... I'll be havin' many a sleepless night figurin' out how this all works together. In fact, if we could just stop a while and try to...

Come on, Khalkus. You'll have time to play with it later.
